Text: The new Canon s300 is 33% larger and 26% heavier than the S100.  The movie mode can only record a max of 30 seconds at 160X120 per clip and a max of 4 seconds at 640X480.  It has one more resolution of 1024X768 and a "Normal" compression mode.  And, it has the 3X zoom.  The price is $... more.
